typedef void(* imageProcessCallback) (int devId, char *buf)
 

Typedef Documentation

typedef void(* imageProcessCallback) (int devId, char *buf)

! "brief image process call back function. this function will be called immediately when a image is caputured.

Parameters
devIdis the device ID which should be in range of 0~11
bufis the image data captured by camera the format is RGB. the pix width is 4byte
See also
adcuAttacthCammeraCallback for more information.
Return values
nothing
